name: arrayAppend
description: Appends an element to the end of an array.

params.name: array
params.description: The array to which the element should be appended.

params.name: value
params.description: The element to append. Can be any type.

params.name: merge
params.description: CF10+ When true appends array elements individually to the specified array. When false (default), the new array is appended as a single element.

lucee.notes: When called as a member function array.append() returns the array instead of boolean.

examples.title: Append a value to an array
examples.description: Uses the arrayAppend function to append a value to the end of the array

examples.title: Append a value to an array using the Array member function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Invoking the append function on an array is the same as running arrayAppend.

examples.title: Append more than one item
examples.description: CF10+ You can merge two arrays when third parameter is set to true.
